verb.definition: To accept or admit the existence or truth of.
verb.example: She acknowledged that she might have been wrong.

verb.definition: To recognize the fact or importance or quality of.
verb.example: The art world has begun to acknowledge his genius.

verb.definition: To show that one has noticed or recognized (someone) by making a gesture or greeting.
verb.example: He acknowledged my presence with a nod.
Please acknowledge receipt of this letter.

usage_examples: The government acknowledged the need for reform.
